ModMetaData.name: Tools For Jobs
ModMetaData.author: Wivex
ModMetaData.description:
We shape our tools and afterwards our tools shape us. (Marshall McLuhan)
This mod adds the following to the game: • Mining Tool (Pickaxe) • Plant Cutting/Harvesting Tool (Handaxe) • Constructing Tool (Hammer)
Tools are used with the corresponding jobs. All can be constructed at the 'Tool Bench' for appropriate costs.
